attributes.action: Call an immediate election on the grounds that he is going to bankrupt the country whilst running round like a headless chicken.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I, Craig Robertson, call on Gordon "save the world" brown to call a General Election immediately.

Britain is sick of his inadequate policies and self belief, not to mention his fantasising on the state of the uk econonmy.

if this petition is removed it shows that number 10 is unwilling to give the public it serves its right to free speech.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
